snippet.title: Evan's Remains - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: Evan's Remains is a mystery-thriller puzzle adventure about finding a missing boy: Evan. The game combines logic-based platform puzzles with narrative inspired by Japanese graphic adventure games.

localized.title: Evan's Remains - Launch Trailer | PS4
